Articles.Content:
Do the particle effects clip against each other more than they used to? Or maybe they're spaced further apart? They looks to me as sharp as shock diamonds.

Maybe it's just me.

edit: regarding this as answered. The effects are the same.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T17:22:09Z" title="05/02/2015 05:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by Bedwyr**
